name: part_001
file: tmp_いつか吾輩もあの頃のインターネットって言われる日が来るのかな #ラプラス・バースデイ2025 [m8hqs4NMij4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the song, thanking the audience.
Street interview segment with a fan in Shibuya.

subtitles.original: 描けないや
subtitles.english: I can't draw it.

subtitles.original: ちょっと泣いて
subtitles.english: Cry a little,

subtitles.original: 無理もしたら
subtitles.english: and if you push yourself,

subtitles.original: ここへおいでよ　いつだって
subtitles.english: come here anytime.

subtitles.original: これからの話をしようか
subtitles.english: Shall we talk about the future?

subtitles.original: 眠たいが寝ない　まだ境界
subtitles.english: I'm sleepy but won't sleep, still at the boundary.

subtitles.original: 僕ら何度だって想い合ったって言うんだよ
subtitles.english: We say we've felt for each other over and over again.

subtitles.original: 傷ついたっていい　見たいから
subtitles.english: It's okay to get hurt, because I want to see.

subtitles.original: なんかハイな声が丁度いいやって泣いちゃって
subtitles.english: Somehow a high voice is just right, and I end up crying.

subtitles.original: 死にたいも消えたいも　異常じゃない
subtitles.english: Neither wanting to die nor wanting to disappear is abnormal.

subtitles.original: よしよしして　水際でほら弾けちゃおう
subtitles.english: There, there, let's pop at the water's edge.

subtitles.original: 君は泣いたって綺麗だよ
subtitles.english: You are beautiful even when you cry.

subtitles.original: さらば　あっち向いて前向いて笑ってこうじゃない？　もう
subtitles.english: Farewell, shouldn't we look that way, look forward and laugh? Already.

subtitles.original: 寂しくない　悲しくない
subtitles.english: I'm not lonely, I'm not sad.

subtitles.original: 塗り重ねた強がり深呼吸洗い流せたら
subtitles.english: If I could wash away the layers of bluffing with a deep breath.

subtitles.original: バイバイを　バイバイを
subtitles.english: Bye bye, bye bye.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿みたいな世界にありがとう　探さないでね
subtitles.english: Thank you to this foolish world, don't look for me.

subtitles.original: そして僕らは　広くも狭くも熱くも寒くもないこの部屋で
subtitles.english: And so we hold hands and breathe in this room that is

subtitles.original: 手を取り合って息をするの
subtitles.english: neither wide nor narrow, hot nor cold.

subtitles.original: 常識外れを外れて二人だけの合言葉で鍵をかけたら
subtitles.english: Deviating from common sense, if we lock up with our secret code,

subtitles.original: さぁどんな夜をしようか
subtitles.english: well, what kind of night shall we have?

subtitles.original: だけど痛い　だから痛い
subtitles.english: But it hurts, that's why it hurts.

subtitles.original: 優しさが染み込んでいく
subtitles.english: Kindness is soaking in.

subtitles.original: 消息を始めようか
subtitles.english: Shall we start our disappearance?

subtitles.original: 眠たいが寝ない　まだ境界
subtitles.english: I'm sleepy but won't sleep, still at the boundary.

subtitles.original: 声を何度だって送り合って保ってきましたが
subtitles.english: I've kept it up by sending my voice over and over again, but...

subtitles.original: やめよう　逃げよう　大丈夫だよ
subtitles.english: Let's stop, let's run away, it's okay.

subtitles.original: もう寝たっていい　ちゃんと僕が守ってあげるから
subtitles.english: It's okay to sleep now, because I'll protect you properly.

subtitles.original: おはようをしよう　また今日にしよう
subtitles.english: Let's say good morning, let's make it today again.

subtitles.original: よしよしして　水際でほら弾けちゃおう
subtitles.english: There, there, let's pop at the water's edge.

subtitles.original: 僕も泣いちゃってヤバイから
subtitles.english: Because I'm also crying and it's bad.

subtitles.original: さらば　あっち向いて前向いて笑ってこうじゃない？
subtitles.english: Farewell, shouldn't we look that way, look forward and laugh?

subtitles.original: 弱虫な僕たちは
subtitles.english: We, who are cowards,

subtitles.original: 回っても　回ってな
subtitles.english: even if we go around, keep going around.

subtitles.original: 終わらない今日も吐いて　光ってく
subtitles.english: Breathing out the never-ending today, shining.

subtitles.original: 辛いのは辛いけど
subtitles.english: Being hard is hard, but

subtitles.original: 二人で乗り越えるさ
subtitles.english: we'll overcome it together.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: えーとね、まだまだ続くから
subtitles.english: Um, there's still more to come,

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ楽しんでいってねー！
subtitles.english: so please enjoy it to the fullest!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ、バイバーイ、バイバーイ、バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye bye, bye bye, bye bye, bye bye!

subtitles.original: 今度、ラプラスさんの生誕祭があるらしいんですけど
subtitles.english: I heard there's going to be a birthday event for La+ soon.

subtitles.original: ええ！マジですか！？ あの、え、ラプラスさんってあのホロライブの！？
subtitles.english: Whoa! Seriously!? Um, eh, La+ as in the one from Hololive!?

subtitles.original: 僕、あの、アレ、待ち受けにしてるんですよ
subtitles.english: I, uh, have that, as my wallpaper.

subtitles.original: しかも今回のハッシュタグが #ラプラス・バースデイ2025 らしくて
subtitles.english: And apparently the hashtag for this time is #LaplusBirthday2025.

subtitles.original: えー！マジでショックです...
subtitles.english: Whaaat! I'm seriously shocked...

subtitles.original: でも、幸せならOKです！
subtitles.english: But if she's happy, it's okay!

subtitles.original: ねぇあたしのことが好きなら　気付いて気付いて気付いて気付いて
subtitles.english: Hey, if you love me, notice me, notice me, notice me, notice me.

subtitles.original: 夢を見させてよ
subtitles.english: Let me dream.

subtitles.original: どうして分かってくれないの　嫌いだ嫌いだ嫌いだ嫌いだ
subtitles.english: Why don't you understand? I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, I hate you.

subtitles.original: 二度と触れないで
subtitles.english: Don't ever touch me again.

subtitles.original: パラサイト 作詞・作曲：DECO*27
subtitles.english: Parasite / Lyrics & Music: DECO*27

subtitles.original: ちょっと待ってどこからおかしくなったの
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, where did it start to go wrong?

subtitles.original: ダメなとこも好きになれてよかったのに
subtitles.english: I was glad that I could even come to love your bad parts.

subtitles.original: バッとのんで誰かに埋めてもらえたら
subtitles.english: If I could just drink it down and have someone fill the void,

subtitles.original: あなたのこと忘れられると思いたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to think I could forget about you.

subtitles.original: キモがって都合よくなければ繋がってるなら悪くはないね
subtitles.english: It's not bad if we're connected, as long as it's not creepy or just for convenience.

subtitles.original: 騙し騙し生きてきちゃって
subtitles.english: Living a life of deception.

subtitles.original: 優しくされると余計に辛いけど冷たくされるの望んでないよ
subtitles.english: It's even more painful when you're kind, but I don't want you to be cold either.

subtitles.original: あたしだけでいいって信じちゃって　バカだ
subtitles.english: Believing that I'm the only one... I'm an idiot.

subtitles.original: ねぇあたしのことが好きなら　気付いて気付いて気付いて気付いて
subtitles.english: Hey, if you love me, notice me, notice me, notice me, notice me.

subtitles.original: 夢を見させてよ
subtitles.english: Let me dream.

subtitles.original: どうして分かってくれないの　嫌いだ嫌いだ嫌いだ嫌いだ
subtitles.english: Why don't you understand? I hate you, I hate you, I hate you, I hate you.

subtitles.original: 二度と触れないで
subtitles.english: Don't ever touch me again.

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 3で流れ星　あの子のこと
subtitles.english: One, two, three, a shooting star... about that girl...
